fields.description: When its internal temperature drops too low, enters a form that is harder than diamond to preserve its life.
Constantly training to help itself and any in need. Responsible, loyal, and serious to a fault.
Rotund and pleasant, the friendliest monster due to its lack of natural predators. Powerful enough to affect Magi.
Powerful of build and small in size, don't let your first impression fool you! Quite dangerous!
Brave and graceful, Soltis is pure in heart and mind. Great kungfu partner, terrible gambler.
A playful and quick-witted creature, almost always care-free. Extremely lucky.
A somber, silent monster.  Sees past and future in glimpses through the Giant's Eye it possesses.
